name: Generic Shopper
background: A user searching for a wide variety of consumer products across categories like electronics, clothing, home goods, and food.

entities.name: Product
entities.description:
An item available for purchase in the environment. Products may belong to categories such as:
- **Electronics**: headphones, smartphones, cameras, smartwatches, cables.
- **Home & Furniture**: rugs, chairs, beds, desks, lamps, storage baskets.
- **Clothing & Accessories**: jeans, t-shirts, coats, shoes, slippers, dresses.
- **Beauty & Personal Care**: shampoos, perfumes, deodorants, foundations, lip glosses.
- **Food & Beverages**: snacks, cereals, sauces, coffee, tea, juices.
- **Party & Decorations**: cupcake toppers, cake toppers, wall art, posters.
- **Health & Oral Care**: toothpaste, toothbrushes, flossers, tongue scrapers.
- **Hair Products**: hair extensions, wigs, storage cases, combs, brushes.
- **Other**: candles, gift baskets, sports gear, travel accessories.

attrs.Name: The name or title of the product.
attrs.Category: The category or type, e.g., rug, perfume, furniture.
attrs.Size: The size or dimensions of the product.
attrs.Material: The material composition, e.g., cotton, stainless steel.
attrs.Flavor/Scent: The flavor or scent if the product is consumable or fragrant.
attrs.Features: Notable characteristics such as easy to clean, wireless, gluten-free.

opts.name: search
opts.description: Find products that match given attributes.

opts.name: select
opts.description: Choose a specific product based on preferences.
